label: Visuelles System
instance_of: anatomische Entität als Metaklasse erster Ordnung. Wird als P31-Wert für alle anatomischen Strukturklassen verwendet. Ihre Instanzen sind Klassen (z. B. Herz)
subclass_of: grouping of various anatomical parts that includes all or some members from two or more different organ subclasses, as well as one or more organ part subclasses, brought together based on shared characteristics
anatomical entity as a 1st order class, to be used at the root of the P279 hierarchy. Its instances are individuals or particulars (e.g. Albert Einstein's brain).
types: anatomische Entität als Metaklasse erster Ordnung. Wird als P31-Wert für alle anatomischen Strukturklassen verwendet. Ihre Instanzen sind Klassen (z. B. Herz)
subclasses: grouping of various anatomical parts that includes all or some members from two or more different organ subclasses, as well as one or more organ part subclasses, brought together based on shared characteristics
anatomical entity as a 1st order class, to be used at the root of the P279 hierarchy. Its instances are individuals or particulars (e.g. Albert Einstein's brain).
